sentences.en: "I like Rupert enormously," she said, with a directness which made Pat flush.
sentences.cn: “我非常喜欢鲁珀特，”她说道，其坦率让帕特羞红了脸。

sentences.en: Blackwell is 59, strong looking and enormously energetic.
sentences.cn: 布莱克韦尔59岁，身体强壮且精力极其充沛。

sentences.en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentences.cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

sentences.en: He helped me enormously with advice on how to do ideological work.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我怎样做思想工作,对我有很大帮助.

sentences.en: Her face went whiter and her brown eyes dilated enormously.
sentences.cn: 她的脸色更苍白,那双褐色的眼睛也瞪大到了吓人的程度.

sentences.en: His research has contributed enormously to our understanding of this disease.
sentences.cn: 他的研究对我们认识这一疾病贡献很大.

sentences.en: Lawrence is one of those writers who either excite you enormously or leave you cold.
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯是那种要么让人激动不已，要么让人觉得索然无味的作家。

sentences.en: The idea of Toni being in danger distresses him enormously.
sentences.cn: 想到托尼正处于危险中，他心急如焚。

sentences.en: The new database will help horse breeders enormously.
sentences.cn: 新数据库将对马匹饲养者有极大的帮助。

sentences.en: The number of calories in different brands of drinks varies enormously.
sentences.cn: 不同牌子的饮料所含的卡路里数大不相同。

sentences.en: Their sporting reputation has suffered enormously from Johnson's exposure.
sentences.cn: 由于约翰逊东窗事发，他们的体育声誉受到了严重损害。

words.tran_cn: 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的
巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上
